channel.title: Riley Gaines on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: These Are The Influencers Who Could Take Over for Charlie Kirk
item.description: As Turning Point USA mourns its founder, influencers like Riley Gaines, Alex Clark and Allie Beth Stuckey could rise to lead a form of socially conservative activism even more ardent than their mentor
